title: Oxfordshire Live: Friday 18 November - BBC News
summary: news , travel , weather and sport from across oxfordshire from friday 18 november .
wind and willows used in court plea .
m40 crash between junctions six and seven .
police show drivers using phones fatal a34 crash footage .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: local live for oxfordshire resumes at 08:00 on monday .
we hope you have a great weekend .

documents.title: weather : 'cold night with frost '
text: this evening and tonight most places will be dry with light winds and clear spells , and just the odd light shower perhaps .
it 'll be a cold night with a frost likely away from oxford and other more built up areas .
minimum temperature 1c ( 34f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: festival to cut number of tickets
text: fewer tickets will be available for next year 's henley festival and prices are to increase slightly .
author: Henley Standard

documents.title: travel update : lane closed on m40 southbound
text: there 's queuing traffic and one lane closed on the m40 southbound between junction 10 , a43 ( brackley ) and junction 9 , a34 ( bicester ) , because of an accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fantastic beasts and where to review them
text: david prever was joined in the studio by radio times film critic james luxford .
they discussed the week 's big new release fantastic beasts and where to find them .
it sees the launch of a new franchise from the pen of jk rowling , set in the harry potter universe , and stars eddie redmayne as newt scamander , a magical beasts collector in 1920s new york .
author: Martin Eastaugh
BBC Radio Oxford producer

documents.title: breakingthree more oxford cyclist murder arrests
text: three more people have been arrested on sus of the murder of a cyclist in oxford .
six people have been taken into custody in connection with the death of eamonn anderson , 56 , who was assaulted in high street , oxford , on 25 october .
he died in hospital on 11 november and iman st clair , 18 , of kestrel crescent , oxford , has been charged with murder .
a further 23-year-old man and two 17-year-old boys , all from oxford , have been arrested on sus of murder .

documents.title: travel update : long delays on a40 westbound
text: there 's long delays on the a40 westbound in eynsham at the freeland turn off , because of an accident involving four or five cars earlier on .
all lanes have been reopened but there 's congestion to the cutteslowe roundabout .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: seven in court after sexual abuse raids
text: seven men have appeared in court charged with 27 historical child sexual exploitation offences in oxford .
the charges include conspiracy to rape , causing or inciting a girl aged 15 to engage in sexual activity , and indecent assault of a girl under 16 .
the men appeared in oxford crown court and were charged as part of thames valley police 's operation rolo after police raids in the city last month .
the offences were allegedly committed between 2000 and 2005 .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC News

documents.title: family 'torn apart ' by home office refusal
text: a man from oxfordshire says his family 's been torn apart after the home office refused to let his chinese wife stay in the country .
steve bearns from wallingford married mary zu six years ago and they have a british-born son together .
but mary 's application to stay in the uk was refused and she 's been in china since january .
wantage mp ed vaizey has called the case a scandal .

documents.title: oxfordshire 's big picture
text: oxfordshire 's big picture

documents.title: the shires in the studio
text: the shires have been speaking to alex lester today ahead of their gig at the o2 academy oxford and played their song a thousand hallelujahs .

documents.title: terminally-ill student 'blown over ' by efforts to complete bucket list
text: matt greenwood , from walsall , said the support he 's received from his friends and family has been `` mind-blowing '' .
he said : `` it 's just incredible really , all the support that 's been coming in , it 's amazing and i 'm so grateful to my friends .
`` when you really really need it in the crunch time , and when it kind of comes through for you , that 's really special . ''
the st edmund hall student 's friends and family broke their original justgiving.com target of £ 10,000 in four hours and are now hoping to raise £ 75,000 .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC News

documents.title: travel update : broken down vehicle on m40 london-bound
text: there 's a broken down vehicle on the m40 london-bound between junction 5 , a40 ( stokenchurch ) and junction 4 , a404 ( high wycombe handy cross roundabout ) .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: friends of terminally-ill student raise £ 45,000 for 'bucket list '
text: friends of a terminally-ill oxford university student have raised £ 45,000 to make his dreams of travelling the world come true .
matt greenwood , 21 , was given nine months to live in october after bone cancer in his hip spread to his lungs .
and despite having his leg amputated the engineering student and keen sportsman is learning to walk again with the aid of crutches .
now his supporters are determined to help him complete his `` bucket list '' .
author: Joe Nimmo
BBC News

documents.title: travel update : a34 partially blocked southbound at east ilsley
text: the a34 is partially blocked and there 's queuing traffic southbound at east ilsley , because of an accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: most common surnames in britain and ireland revealed
text: the origins of more than 45,000 surnames have been revealed by a new study - giving some people a fresh insight into where their names come from .
the surname database , which will soon be searchable in some libraries , is the result of four years of work led by the university of the west of england .
its fascinating findings have been published in the oxford english dictionary of family names in britain and ireland .

documents.title: the race for pudsey at bbc oxford and radio berkshire
text: mannequin challenge , pudsey styleee !
who 's gon na get to him first !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid # mannequinchallenge # cin

documents.title: new gcse grades increases pressure on students
text: an oxfordshire headteacher has criticised plans to overhaul the gcse grading system .
caroline jordan , who runs headington school , says introducing a numbering system will increase pressure on pupils , particularly perfectionists .
a to g grades will be replaced with numbers one to nine - with nine being the highest .
the department for education says reforms have reduced exam pressure by scrapping january modules and removing resits from league tables .

documents.title: watch : how children in need cash helps charity
text: it 's children in need day and here 's one reason to give your pennies .
local charity home start banbury and chipping norton

text: pepperell battles through q school pain

text: here 's the latest headlines from bbc radio oxford :
author: BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: breakingman charged with cyclist murder
text: an 18-year-old man has been charged with the murder of a cyclist , who died after being pushed off his bike by a group of people .
iman st clair , of kestrel crescent , oxford was arrested on wednesday and was charged yesterday evening with one count of murder .
he will appear at oxford magistrate 's court later today .
two other people have also been arrested on sus of murder .
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: watch : did you miss the oxford united q & a ?
text: last night we spent an hour putting your questions to the u 's boss michael appleton and chairman darryl eales on facebook .
here 's the video if you want to catch up .

documents.title: wind in the willows used in court plea
text: extracts from the wind in the willows are read out in court in an attempt to stop a hydro-electric scheme .

documents.title: travel latest : crash on m40 northbound
text: travel latest : crash on m40 northbound
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: bosses who went back , for better or worse
text: sport looks at bosses , like qpr 's ian holloway and oxford united 's jim smith , who make multiple stops at one club on the managerial merry-go-round .

documents.title: police show drivers using phones fatal a34 footage
text: thames valley police is showing drivers they catch using mobile phones while driving footage of a fatal crash on the a34 that killed four people in august .

tomasz kroker was sentenced to 10 years after he pleaded guilty to being distracted by his phone when driving a lorry , which led to the deaths of tracey houghton , 45 , her sons ethan and joshua , and her partner 's daughter aimee goldsmith .
the shock tactics were used on thursday in oxfordshire .
one offender said : `` i 'll definitely be telling my colleagues to be more careful , not just because you can get caught but because it was really dangerous . ''

documents.title: friday 's weather : decidedly chilly with blustery showers
text: it 's going to be decidedly chilly today , but mainly sunny , although there is the chance of some blustery showers later on this afternoon .
temperatures will be struggling to get above 6c .

documents.title: what are you doing for children in need ?
text: it 's that time of year again , it 's children in need , and bbc oxford is in a battle royale to beat radio berkshire in a quest to find pudsey in the county .
we 'll be bringing you updates from roving reporter lilley mitchell , and we want to hear what you 're doing to raise money for children in need .
do n't forget to send us your snaps from around the county for this week 's oxfordshire big picture via email .
above is a great of godstow from xuguang liu .
author: Alex Regan
South Online
